entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.29.0 Multi-tool supports split and images, Split by Chapters and more!
entry.content:
Major Enhancements

  • Added https://www.stirlingpdf.com/ to the footer, We have paid support coming for all companies that want it, Please sign up in Contact Us form to find out more in future! Surveys to come...
  • Add image support to multi-tool page by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1769
  • Add document splitting functionality to the multi-tools page by @FiratUsta in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1808
  • Feature: Split PDFs by Chapters/Bookmarks by @Rudra-241 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1786
  • Added functionality to set font size and font type to add page numbers in both frontend and backend. by @creator1999 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1783
  • Introduced legal document support (Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy etc) within settings.yml.
  • Enhanced metrics collection to include unique user counts.

Bug fixes

  • Change display name WEPB to WEBP by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1762

  • Page Scale: add pageSize KEEP #1798 by @nachokb in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1800
  • Stirling-PDF now sets metadata for all PDF files to mark stirling-pdf as editor/creator etc

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.30.0 Lots of tweaks, UI home page update and bug fixes
entry.content:
Stirling PDF has another new release with lots of updates as we get ready for the launch of our pro version. (No functionality is being removed from the free version) This update also brings a new category-based home menu, let us know what you think!

List of all the changes in this release:

Major

  • Added new user survey
  • Home page improvements by @FiratUsta in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1940
  • Added functionality to use the next available port by @Akhil-2020171 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1913 Bug fixes
  • Added optional Opt IN user analytics to help improve Stirling-PDF
  • commit for feature developing invert-replace color of a pdf for stirl… by @Hashim0510 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1982
  • Added page counts to merge pdf tool by @Charan19001A0231 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1986
  • Major Enhancements to SAML2 and OAuth2 Integration with Simplified Security Configurations by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2040 WIP not yet fully finished

Bug fixes

  • fix: rotate preview in multitool for images by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1909
  • fixed colorspace array exception by @sadi10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1925
  • Fix pdfa conversion by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1907
  • [fix]: Support for decryption of PDFs if encrypted without password by @maxi322 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1949

Minor Enhancements

  • Load pdf libs when needed by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1902
  • length of card which was getting displayed on hovering is reduced by @amankhangit in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1915
